name: Anne Bonny
description: Bonny is a strong, independent woman, who became a respected pirate in a predominantly male society.And now she came to try steal your goods!

name: Blackbeard
description: His deeds, behavior and a terrifying image made him a perfect villain, who harassed many ships in Caribbean and now wants to steal your goods!

name: Edward England
description: This Irishman is a successful pirate, who captured many ships. However, his kindness and not-so-pirate attitude prevented him to become even greater. Maybe he will spare your life?!
